name: Just Pong
description:
So I have been wanting to get back into game development for quite a while and having not made a finished project in 11 years I have decided to start with the basics. Here is the classic pong with a TWIST!

This is also an "entry" for #MiniLD65

CONTROLS:
Press "R" to restart game
Left and Right Click for TWIST!

Catch me on Twitter: Stan The Guy
